snippet.title: Sorcerian gameplay (PC Game, 1987)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Sorcerian, Dos PC game produced by Sierra in 1987 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/sorcerian/677/
It is a fantasy adventure type game, well done all sorts of monsters and quite successful graphics. worth a try.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Zeliard - https://youtu.be/PFYj72zJIls
Ancient Land of Ys - https://youtu.be/lFW3tnN3zmA
Faery Tale Adventure - https://youtu.be/FiI3NdW3SUg
